price: Anaasε wͻ’ka sε (Nkͻmhyεni) yε ͻdwomtoni, enti montwεn no wͻ mmusuo berε bi mu?
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna shāʿirun natarabbaṣu bihi rayba al-manūni
